data.name: Delta Jump
data.tooltip:
Teleports to a nearby target location.

Enemies next to original location have their attack and movement speed reduced by <d ref="(-1) * duckiesHeroExoBlink_Debuff.modifiers[0].amount"/>% and will take extra <d ref="duckiesHeroExoBlink_DebuffDamageResponse.modify_amount"/> damage each time they're attacked.

This effect will persist for <d ref="duckiesHeroExoBlink_Debuff.duration"/> seconds.
